Ecosystem.description: ZorroCoin is the result of a simple question from a decentralized community of the ITESZ (Instituto Tecnol√≥gico de Estudios Superiores de Zamora):
Ecosystem.description-comma: Could a decentralized student team make a cryptocurrency for students and also that benefits the environment?
Ecosystem.description-3: ZorroCoin, is an ERC-20 token based on the Polygon network. It aims to prove that it's possible, the ZorroCoin community started developing an entire ecosystem with this thought and philosophy in mind.

card-1.title: ZorroCoin (ZORRO)
card-1.description: Campaign to promote recycling at ITESZ and provide liquidity to the token

card-2.title: Acceptance
card-2.description: Implement as a payment method in different ITESZ nodes

card-3.title: RedZorro (blockchain)
card-3.description: Create projects, sign documents, issue NFTs using the proprietary blockchain developed by the ZorroCoin community

event-1.title: RECYCLE CAMPAIGN
event-1.description: Private event. Campaign with the objective of promoting the recycling culture within ITESZ and obtaining liquidity.

event-2.title: INITIAL COIN OFFERING (ICO)
event-2.description: Public event. First initial coin offering for all investors interested in the ecosystem.

Roadmap.description: Integrate as a payment method at ITESZ

Roadmap.message: Do you have an idea or project to contribute? Contact ZorroCoin team
